channel.title: RobinsonCentral
channel.description: Sorry for the clutter and instability as I fire the blog up under the Jekyll engine.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
In an attempt to get back to blogging and documenting my current learning trends, I thought it was time to fire up a new blog. So it follows that the new site should be something that I can poke and play with programming and my learning, and I am firing it up under GitHub Pages with a Jekyll engine.

I will apologize in advance that his will end up being down as much as up as I learn to adapt, customize it, and slowly write posts about things I am working on and learning.

Next up will be a wrap up on Cisco Live 2015, and all that transpired from my perspective.
